titleStmt.title: Return of lands by Krǝstos ʾAbuhu
CCR 18

editionStmt.p: The encoding was carried out by Nafisa Valieva thanks to the project HornEast that has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (Grant agreement No. 726206).

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

abstract.p: This document, number eighteen in Carlo Conti Rossini's edition (and therefore CCR 18 according to Bausi's reference). The document is attested twice, once on verso with CCR 24 and 25. Below this document there is an added text of CCR 3 . Further, this document was apparently carefully copied into a small quire, which contains a number of documents likely copied from older documents (originals?) in the sixteenth century.

div.ab:
በአኰቴተ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ። አግባእኩ፡
አነ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ አቡሁ፡ በአፈ፡ ዐምደ፡ ጽዮን፡ ንጉሥ፡ ተርከ፡
ዘቀዳሚ፡ ምድሮሙ፡ ለቅዱሳን፡ እለ፡ ቤተ፡ መጣዕ፡ እንዘ፡ ዐቃ
ቤ፡ ሰዐትነ፡ ዕቅበ፡ እግዚእ፡ ወእመቦ፡ ዘተኀየሎሙ፡ ወዘተ
ሀገሎሙ፡ ለቅዱሳን፡ ይእቲ፡ ምድር፡ በጽንፉ፡ ወበቀልቀላ፡ ለ
ተርከ። ውገዘ፡ ለይኩን፡ በአፈ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡
ቅዱስ፡ በአፈ፡ ፫በወ፰ነ፡ ርቱበነ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ወበአፈ፡ ፲ወር፡
ነቢያት፡ ወበአፈ፡ ፲ወ፪፡ ሐዋርያት፡ ወበአፈ፡ ጴጥሮስ፡ ሊቀ፡
ጳጳሳት፡ ዘኢይትፈታሕ፡ በጸም፡ ወበጸሎት፡ በሰኤል፡ ወበሰጊ
ድ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ ወአሜን፡ ለይኩን፡ ለይኩን። ወ
እመቦ፡ ዘደምሰሳ፡ ወዘቀደዳ፡ በጽልሑት፡ ከማሁ፡ ለይኩን፡
ውጉዘ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን።
